Class Poison

    GamePiece

    public class Poison
extends Item
    Version:
    cs56 Spring 13 This class represents a class of Item called a Poison which takes away HP from the players Health Points (hit points) Its in game icon is !
    Author:
    Hans Marasigan and Richard Nguyen
